name: Modern Commando Robo Shooting
description:
Modern Commando Robo Shooting game is all about mech robots fighting game and modern commando real strike against the terrorist robots which are in the city and destroying the whole city. Earth is under attack of modern gangster robots which have modern shooting weapons and modern robots military training. Let us fight like an elite superhero Commando to kill the robots by the bravo shots to save earth from dangerous robots. It is time to play introductory warfare Modern Commando Robo Shooting game which is full of modern elite missions strike. Like a modern army military commando you have to destroy all the mech robots warrior in this mech gunners battle. This steel robot world war game have new ultimate thrilling guns for rival shot rak fire against the robot icons in this robot city combat commando shooting adventure game.
The robots have new modern elite combat action skills into the world of terrorist robot mafia and have the medals of the modern liberated gunners in this gun shot modern commando fire war. Keep in your mind that behind the buildings in the city of realistic earth environment there are steel robots with heavy guns and modern iron weapons on duty to stop you like a guerrilla robot force. You are like an IGI modern commando squad of the army and Your duty is to stop the mech robot battle by killing all robo gangsters for your survival and keep moving forward until fight is end in this war robot shooting game.
In this Modern Commando Robo Shooting game, there are different challenging levels in this modern global military war. You may have played many other shooting games but this combat steel robot shooting warfare game is worth playing.
A game where you have to kill modern robotics which are in action by the modern thrilling weapons. Ultimate iron robots mech steel battle is a science fiction dead war age game featuring super quality 3D graphics with the modern and latest weapons and fully equipped real igi super commando to destroy the iron robots. Now it is your time to become the real modern commando and save earth in this modern commando warfare robot war.

Modern Commando Robo Shooting Features:
• HD Graphics and 3D environment.
• Amusing realistic sounds.
• Challenging and highly addictive missions.
• Multiple shooting guns.
• Smooth shooting controls.
• Earn score for purchasing high range guns.
• Offline gameplay.
• Smooth controls in this modern robot shooting game.
• It is a paid game available on app store.
